br.font: Providing children with a better prospect in life through superior education.

a.class: u_1374940271 align-center dmButtonLink dmWidget dmWwr default dmOnlyButton dmDefaultGradient

font.span: Rise Academy is a tuition-free charter school offering

img.alt: African American teacher teaching the children

span.span:
We have great expectations for Rise students
- both current students and our graduates.

div.font: After 8th grade graduation, most students enroll in local high school magnet programs pursuing a rigorous and demanding college preparatory curriculum.

a.class: u_1213194904 dmButtonLink dmWidget dmWwr default dmOnlyButton
a.span: Learn More About Our Academic Programs

span.span: Rise Academy Charter School Follows an Open Enrollment Policy

div.font:
Enrollment at Rise Academy is open to all Lubbock-area students and begins with a two-week period in early April. During this time parents can learn more about our program and then enroll their child if they choose.
Give your child a solid foundation to a brighter future. Enroll at Rise Academy today!
For more information, call 806-744-0438.

a.class: dmButtonLink dmWidget dmWwr default dmOnlyButton dmDefaultGradient u_1935993020

font.b: Teachers and administrators should use these helpful links:

div.style: transition:none; border-image: none; display: block; float: none;

font.a: Guidelines for Students at-risk for Anaphylaxis

div.div:
Rise Academy Charter School was established in 1999.
As a tuition-free charter school, we provide quality education to children in pre-K through the 8th grade. Enroll your children at our school today!
